root: ^You (Streamer): Well, I guess we know how those fried ice cubes turned out.
^I'm going to beat you with a hammer.

comedy: ^Flork: Yes, I know. Thank you for acknowledging it.
^You (Streamer): Look, I get the appeal of the joke, but when you have chat screaming it at you 24/7 it gets old fast.
^You (Streamer): Don’t you have any other jokes?
^You (Streamer): I swear I will end stream if I hear another childish joke.
^Flork: Well, sorry for having the humor of a five year old.
^You (Streamer): You probably ARE a five year old! I can’t tell how old you guys are!
hammer: ^Flork: Well, that makes you the imposter!
^You (Streamer): I don’t care what you call me at this point, I am sick of that meme.
^You (Streamer): You play Among Us ONCE, during the pandemic when everyone’s going ax crazy…
^Flork: Red is sus, vote them out!
^You (Streamer): Yeah, okay, whatever. I’ll just go shoot myself out of the airlock.
^Flork: No, you have to be voted out! If you space yourself without getting voted out that’s sus!
^You (Streamer): What do you WANT from me???
^Flork: To sit still while we vote!
interlude: ^You (Streamer): Okay, that’s enough. How do I turn off the game.
^Flork 6: No don’t shoot me out of the airlock I’m so sexy aha
^You (Streamer): That was a lot, to say the least.
^You (Streamer): GUYS, IF YOU CAN STILL HEAR ME, REFRESH THE STREAM -
